actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation of steel products manufactured in countries that have only marginal raw steel production capability.

summary.text: Prohibits, for a specified time, imports of steel articles from any country designated as a marginal raw steel producer. Requires the Secretary of Commerce to designate, and certify such designation to the Commissioner of Customs, a country as a marginal raw steel producer if the country: (1) produced less than 5,000 tons of raw steel annually during 1983, 1984, and 1985; or (2) has no facility capable of producing at least 1,000 tons of raw steel annually. Requires the Commissioner to take appropriate action to enforce the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation of steel products manufactured in countries that have only marginal raw steel production capability.
